title: Bloomberg Markets: Whole Foods Sees 25% Jump in Shoppers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Whole Foods Sees 25% Jump in Shoppers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Craig Giammona Consumer Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Amazon.com Inc.’s splashy takeover of Whole Foods, complete with deep price cuts, did more than bring a surge of publicity to the chain: It boosted customer traffic by 25 percent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
